00080 class ASSIMP_API Exporter {
00081 public:
00083     typedef void (*fpExportFunc)(const char*, IOSystem*, const aiScene*, const ExportProperties*);
00084 
00086     struct ExportFormatEntry
00087     {
00089         aiExportFormatDesc mDescription;
00090 
00091         // Worker function to do the actual exporting
00092         fpExportFunc mExportFunction;
00093 
00094         // Post-processing steps to be executed PRIOR to invoking mExportFunction
00095         unsigned int mEnforcePP;
00096 
00097         // Constructor to fill all entries
00098         ExportFormatEntry( const char* pId, const char* pDesc, const char* pExtension, fpExportFunc pFunction, unsigned int pEnforcePP = 0u)
00099         {
00100             mDescription.id = pId;
00101             mDescription.description = pDesc;
00102             mDescription.fileExtension = pExtension;
00103             mExportFunction = pFunction;
00104             mEnforcePP = pEnforcePP;
00105         }
00106 
00107         ExportFormatEntry() :
00108             mExportFunction()
00109           , mEnforcePP()
00110         {
00111             mDescription.id = NULL;
00112             mDescription.description = NULL;
00113             mDescription.fileExtension = NULL;
00114         }
00115     };
00116 
00117 
00118 public:
00119     Exporter();
00120     ~Exporter();
00121 
00122 public:
00123     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00138     void SetIOHandler( IOSystem* pIOHandler);
00139 
00140     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00147     IOSystem* GetIOHandler() const;
00148 
00149     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00154     bool IsDefaultIOHandler() const;
00155 
00156     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00174     const aiExportDataBlob* ExportToBlob(const aiScene* pScene, const char* pFormatId, unsigned int pPreprocessing = 0u, const ExportProperties* = NULL);
00175     const aiExportDataBlob* ExportToBlob(  const aiScene* pScene, const std::string& pFormatId, unsigned int pPreprocessing = 0u, const ExportProperties* pProperties = NULL);
00176 
00177     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00210     aiReturn Export( const aiScene* pScene, const char* pFormatId, const char* pPath, unsigned int pPreprocessing = 0u, const ExportProperties* pProperties = NULL);
00211     aiReturn Export( const aiScene* pScene, const std::string& pFormatId, const std::string& pPath,  unsigned int pPreprocessing = 0u, const ExportProperties* pProperties = NULL);
00212 
00213     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00223     const char* GetErrorString() const;
00224 
00225     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00227     const aiExportDataBlob* GetBlob() const;
00228 
00229     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00233     const aiExportDataBlob* GetOrphanedBlob() const;
00234 
00235     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00243     void FreeBlob( );
00244 
00245     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00253     size_t GetExportFormatCount() const;
00254 
00255     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00269     const aiExportFormatDesc* GetExportFormatDescription( size_t pIndex ) const;
00270 
00271     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00282     aiReturn RegisterExporter(const ExportFormatEntry& desc);
00283 
00284     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00293     void UnregisterExporter(const char* id);
00294 
00295 protected:
00296     // Just because we don't want you to know how we're hacking around.
00297     ExporterPimpl* pimpl;
00298 };
00299 
00300 class ASSIMP_API ExportProperties {
00301 public:
00302     // Data type to store the key hash
00303     typedef unsigned int KeyType;
00304 
00305     // typedefs for our four configuration maps.
00306     // We don't need more, so there is no need for a generic solution
00307     typedef std::map<KeyType, int> IntPropertyMap;
00308     typedef std::map<KeyType, ai_real> FloatPropertyMap;
00309     typedef std::map<KeyType, std::string> StringPropertyMap;
00310     typedef std::map<KeyType, aiMatrix4x4> MatrixPropertyMap;
00311 
00312 public:
00316     ExportProperties();
00317 
00318     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00324     ExportProperties(const ExportProperties& other);
00325 
00326     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00339     bool SetPropertyInteger(const char* szName, int iValue);
00340 
00341     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00348     bool SetPropertyBool(const char* szName, bool value)    {
00349         return SetPropertyInteger(szName,value);
00350     }
00351 
00352     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00356     bool SetPropertyFloat(const char* szName, ai_real fValue);
00357 
00358     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00362     bool SetPropertyString(const char* szName, const std::string& sValue);
00363 
00364     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00368     bool SetPropertyMatrix(const char* szName, const aiMatrix4x4& sValue);
00369 
00370     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00383     int GetPropertyInteger(const char* szName,
00384         int iErrorReturn = 0xffffffff) const;
00385 
00386     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00393     bool GetPropertyBool(const char* szName, bool bErrorReturn = false) const {
00394         return GetPropertyInteger(szName,bErrorReturn)!=0;
00395     }
00396 
00397     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00401     ai_real GetPropertyFloat(const char* szName,
00402         ai_real fErrorReturn = 10e10f) const;
00403 
00404     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00410     const std::string GetPropertyString(const char* szName,
00411         const std::string& sErrorReturn = "") const;
00412 
00413     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00419     const aiMatrix4x4 GetPropertyMatrix(const char* szName,
00420         const aiMatrix4x4& sErrorReturn = aiMatrix4x4()) const;
00421 
00422     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00426     bool HasPropertyInteger(const char* szName) const;
00427 
00431     bool HasPropertyBool(const char* szName) const;
00432 
00436     bool HasPropertyFloat(const char* szName) const;
00437 
00441     bool HasPropertyString(const char* szName) const;
00442 
00446     bool HasPropertyMatrix(const char* szName) const;
00447 
00448 protected:
00449 
00451     IntPropertyMap mIntProperties;
00452 
00454     FloatPropertyMap mFloatProperties;
00455 
00457     StringPropertyMap mStringProperties;
00458 
00460     MatrixPropertyMap mMatrixProperties;
00461 };
00462 
00463 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00464 inline 
00465 const aiExportDataBlob* Exporter::ExportToBlob(  const aiScene* pScene, const std::string& pFormatId,
00466                                                  unsigned int pPreprocessing, const ExportProperties* pProperties)
00467 {
00468     return ExportToBlob(pScene,pFormatId.c_str(),pPreprocessing, pProperties);
00469 }
00470 
00471 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00472 inline
00473 aiReturn Exporter :: Export( const aiScene* pScene, const std::string& pFormatId, 
00474                                     const std::string& pPath, unsigned int pPreprocessing, 
00475                                     const ExportProperties* pProperties)
00476 {
00477     return Export(pScene,pFormatId.c_str(),pPath.c_str(),pPreprocessing, pProperties);
00478 }
